member.name: MESSAGE_RESOURCE_BLOCK
member.summary: Contains information about message strings with identifiers in the range indicated by theLowId andHighId members.

member.name: MESSAGE_RESOURCE_BLOCK.LowId
member.summary: The lowest message identifier contained within this structure.

member.name: MESSAGE_RESOURCE_BLOCK.HighId
member.summary: The highest message identifier contained within this structure.

member.name: MESSAGE_RESOURCE_BLOCK.OffsetToEntries
member.summary: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the structure to the structures in this MESSAGE_RESOURCE_BLOCK. The MESSAGE_RESOURCE_ENTRY structures contain the message strings.
